faqs.q: How many calories in a hot and sour soup serving?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal per 1 cup serving under standard assumptions.

faqs.q: Is hot and sour soup high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, typically ~800 mg sodium per cup due to broth and seasonings.

faqs.q: What are the macros for hot and sour soup?
faqs.a: Per cup: 8 g protein, 10 g carbs, 7 g fat.

faqs.q: Does hot and sour soup have fiber?
faqs.a: About 1 g dietary fiber per cup from vegetables like mushrooms and bamboo shoots.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in hot and sour soup?
faqs.a: Use less oil in preparation or opt for vegetable-only versions without egg.
